summary: A Flax (JAX) pipeline that orchestrates a VAE, CLIP text encoder, tokenizer, UNet denoiser, ControlNet conditioning module, scheduler, and safety checker to produce images from textual prompts with additional control signals, handling all preprocessing, latent diffusion steps, and post‑processing in a single workflow.
business_intent: Give developers and enterprises a high‑performance, controllable text‑to‑image generation tool that can be integrated into creative applications such as advertising, game asset creation, design prototyping, and content generation, while providing built‑in safety filtering for inappropriate outputs.
